name: Digimon Crest Dashboard (Dark ver.)
description:
A dark version of my Tumblr dashboard. All of the original 8 crests + Kindness are included. /// Made by rainbowdrusy 

EDIT: 11/27/12: Reformatted the coding so it should work with XKit and auto replies.

Also, if you have a custom icon set installed, I have found that if you install the theme and then the icons, it works better.
